name: Golf Without Your Friends
description:
Click and drag to shoot away the golfball. Hit the black hole underneath the flag pole to advance to the next level!

This game was made for the BTP Game Jam #3. The game is far from finished but we wanted to upload something, so here it goes!

I had no luck trying to find out why the resolution is all weird in WebGL. It's not ideal but if you go full screen it's somewhat playable.
